thread.title: Susan Wiley
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Susan Wiley

author: Susan Wiley
title: Susan Wiley
text: I had some issues with the website so I called. They were very helpful and corrected the problem. I was notified about my order at each step of the way which was much appreciated because the order was extensive. My order was well protected even though the package had one side split open; the order was not damaged. It's great that I can order, in one place, all I need to put my artwork together, except for the frame.
